name: Recover Files from Maxtor Hard Drive Windows 7
tagline: Free download Windows 7 recovery software to restore files from Maxtor hard drive
body:
You may lose some important files from Maxtor hard disk drive on Windows 7 computer due to following reasons:
* Deleting files from Windows 7 hard disk drive unintentionally
* Not realize the importance of the deleted files before you empty the recycle bin
* [Mistakenly delete disk partition on Windows 7](http://www.icare-recovery.com/howto/deleted-partition-recovery.html)
* Format Windows 7 disk partition with important data on the disk drive
* [Windows 7 partition shows not formatted error](http://www.icare-recovery.com/howto/the-drive-is-not-formatted-do-you-want-to-format-it-now.html) or RAW file system
* Disk partition which contains important data disappeared in "My Computer"

### Maxtor Hard Drive Recovery on Windows 7
Maxtor hard drive data is recoverable on Windows 7 in situations above. You only need to select a reliable and safe data recovery program, and the problem can be resolved thoroughly. [iCare Data  Recovery](http://www.icare-recovery.com/) is an advanced and powerful data recovery program for all Windows 7 users to restore files or folders when got lost due to formatting, deleting, hard disk not formatted error, hard drive raw file system, partition deleted or lost and more other reasons. It can work on all kinds of Maxtor hard drives and has a user-friendly interface, so you can easily restore lost data from Maxtor hard drive.

### Accidentally Format Hard Disk on Windows 7
One common cause for Windows 7 data loss is formatting of Maxtor hard disk drive. One situation is that you may [format hard drive on Windows 7](http://www.icare-recovery.com/windows-7-recovery/windows-7-format-recovery.html) by chance, while the other situation is that you may format Maxtor hard drive due to certain reasons such as you get disk partition not formatted error message on Windows 7, Windows 7 is infected with virus or hard drive has bad sectors and more other reasons. For all data loss situations mentioned here, iCare Data Recovery is able to restore the lost files with ease.

### Is Data Recoverable When Formatting Maxtor Hard Disk due to Disk Error?
When your [Maxtor hard disk is formatted due to human mistake](http://www.icare-recovery.com/faq/accidentally-formatted-drive.html), it only removes files from the hard disk. However, when a hard disk shows disk error like hard disk not formatted error, the files may be corrupted. If you format the hard disk in this situation, can you still recover the lost files? In fact, files are still recoverable with iCare Data Recovery. You just need to run "Deep Scan Recovery" module to search for and recover the lost files.

**Note**: When a hard disk has not formatted error or other kinds of errors, we often recommend you to recover files from the hard disk first of all and then format the hard disk because the data is at a risk of being overwritten if you mistakenly write some new data to the hard disk after formatting.

### Undelete Files from Maxtor Hard Drive in Windows 7
Another main reason for Maxtor hard disk data loss might be deletion of files. You may delete some files mistakenly from the disk partition, or even worse, you [delete the partition](http://www.icare-recovery.com/windows-7-recovery/windows-7-deleted-partition-recovery.html) without backup data. In order to recover as more data as possible after deleting, you should always remember not to write new data to a Maxtor disk partition where files were deleted. By using iCare Data Recovery, it is possible to restore almost all deleted files on condition that they are not overwritten.
